quests.situation: A woman is reading a book in a cozy cafe.
quests.sampleAnswer: A woman sits by the window of a warm cafe, absorbed in her book with coffee beside her.

quests.situation: An old man feeding pigeons in the park.
quests.sampleAnswer: An elderly man sits on a park bench, scattering breadcrumbs for a group of eager pigeons.
quests.hint: Describe both the person and animals.

quests.situation: Students studying late at the library.
quests.sampleAnswer: Several students sit at long tables surrounded by books, studying under soft lamplight.

quests.situation: A family having a picnic by a lake.
quests.sampleAnswer: A family spreads a blanket beside a calm lake, enjoying sandwiches and laughter.

quests.situation: A dog playing fetch in a field.
quests.sampleAnswer: A golden retriever bounds across a green field, chasing a tennis ball thrown by its owner.

quests.situation: Traffic jam in a busy city during rush hour.
quests.sampleAnswer: Cars sit bumper to bumper on a wide boulevard as horns honk and pedestrians weave between lanes.

quests.situation: A man is waiting for a bus in the rain.
quests.sampleAnswer: A man stands at a bus stop under a gray sky, holding an umbrella.

quests.situation: Two children are building a sandcastle on the beach.
quests.sampleAnswer: Two kids kneel on the sandy shore, carefully shaping towers of wet sand.
